#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int getBest(int x){
	int temp = x; 
	int base = 1; 
	while(temp){
		base = max(base, temp%10 + 1);
		temp /= 10; 	
	}
	int ret = 0; 
	int mul = 1;
	while(x){
		ret += (x % 10) * mul; 
		mul *= base; 
		x /= 10;
	} 
	return ret;
}

int main(){
	int t; 
	cin >> t; 
	while(t--){
		int a,b; 
		cin >> a >> b; 
		a = getBest(a); 
		b = getBest(b); 
		cout << a + b << endl;
	}
}
